column5: The Olive Haven a 1920 Cottage home with lots of charm! Open floor plan, original wood floor throughout, 1 King size master bed with private bath, two other bedrooms with queen size beds, washer/dryer, everything you need for a relaxing getaway. Large backyard, with deck. Minutes away to downtown, The Riverwalk, and The Pearl.
column8: The Olive Haven close to SA main attractions
